title: Israeli Soccer Fans Attacked In Amsterdam, Netanyahu Sends Rescue Planes
content: Israel PM Benjamin Netanyahu has ordered the dispatch of two planes to Amsterdam to evacuate Israeli soccer fans who were attacked by an alleged Pro-Palestinian mob on Thursday night.
summary: Israel PM Benjamin Netanyahu has ordered the dispatch of two planes to Amsterdam to evacuate Israeli soccer fans who were attacked by an alleged Pro-Palestinian mob on Thursday night.

title: India Deserves To Be In List Of Global Superpowers: Vladimir Putin
content: India deserves to be included in the list of global superpowers as its economy is currently growing faster than in any other country, Russian President Vladimir Putin has said.
summary: India deserves to be included in the list of global superpowers as its economy is currently growing faster than in any other country, Russian President Vladimir Putin has said.

title: China Prepares For Trump's Return, Focuses On Ties And Stability
content: After Donald Trump first entered the White House eight years ago, rattled Chinese leaders responded to his tariffs and fiery rhetoric with force, resulting in a trade war that plunged ties between the globe's largest economies to multiyear lows.
summary: After Donald Trump first entered the White House eight years ago, rattled Chinese leaders responded to his tariffs and fiery rhetoric with force, resulting in a trade war that plunged ties between the globe's largest economies to multiyear lows.

title: From 1800s To COP29: Highlights Of UN Climate Talks Over The Years
content: This year's UN climate conference in Baku, Azerbaijan, marks the world's 29th leadership gathering to confront global warming since the first "Conference of the Parties" in 1995.
summary: This year's UN climate conference in Baku, Azerbaijan, marks the world's 29th leadership gathering to confront global warming since the first "Conference of the Parties" in 1995.

title: "Did Entire World A Favour": Minister On Why India Buys Russian Oil
content: Union Petroleum and Natural Gas minister Hardeep Singh Puri said oil will remain a key part of the world's energy supply for years to come.
summary: Union Petroleum and Natural Gas minister Hardeep Singh Puri said oil will remain a key part of the world's energy supply for years to come.

title: Turkish Boss Denies Indian Man Wedding Leave, He Marries Over Video Call
content: The marriage ceremony of Adnan Muhammad, a resident of Bilaspur, had to be performed virtually as the company for which he works in Turkiye refused to grant him leave, his family members said.
summary: The marriage ceremony of Adnan Muhammad, a resident of Bilaspur, had to be performed virtually as the company for which he works in Turkiye refused to grant him leave, his family members said.

title: Mark Zuckerberg Avoids Personal Liability In Meta Addiction Cases
content: A federal judge again rejected a bid to hold Mark Zuckerberg individually liable in two dozen lawsuits accusing Meta Platforms Inc. and other social media companies of addicting children to their products.
summary: A federal judge again rejected a bid to hold Mark Zuckerberg individually liable in two dozen lawsuits accusing Meta Platforms Inc. and other social media companies of addicting children to their products.

title: In 17th-Century "Anti-Vampire" Grave, Woman Buried With Sickle Around Neck
content: Archaeologists investigating a 400-year-old grave in northern Poland have found the remains of a young woman buried with a sickle across her neck and a padlock on her left big toe.
summary: Archaeologists investigating a 400-year-old grave in northern Poland have found the remains of a young woman buried with a sickle across her neck and a padlock on her left big toe.

title: Trump Media Shares Surge By Nearly 8% After His US Presidential Win
content: After Donald Trump's landslide win in Tuesday's US elections, shares in Trump Media & Technology Group surged, adding nearly $300 million to the President-elect's fortune.
summary: After Donald Trump's landslide win in Tuesday's US elections, shares in Trump Media & Technology Group surged, adding nearly $300 million to the President-elect's fortune.

title: China's Maths "Prodigy" Cheated To Ace The Global Contest, Probe Finds
content: A 17-year-old student in China hailed as a "genius" for her score in a maths competition cheated, competition organisers said.
summary: A 17-year-old student in China hailed as a "genius" for her score in a maths competition cheated, competition organisers said.

title: Australian Outlet That Interviewed S Jaishankar Responds To Canada's Ban
content: An Australian news outlet has raised concerns over press freedom after it was blocked by Canada for airing an interview with Foreign Minister S Jaishankar and the press conference of Australian Senator Penny Wong.
summary: An Australian news outlet has raised concerns over press freedom after it was blocked by Canada for airing an interview with Foreign Minister S Jaishankar and the press conference of Australian Senator Penny Wong.

title: Queen Elizabeth's 1947 Wedding Cake Slice Auctioned For Rs 2.40 Lakh
content: A 77-year-old slice of wedding cake from the 1947 royal wedding of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip has just been sold for £2,200 (around Rs 2.40 lakh) at an auction.
summary: A 77-year-old slice of wedding cake from the 1947 royal wedding of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip has just been sold for Â£2,200 (around Rs 2.40 lakh) at an auction.

title: Americans See Immigration As Trump's Top Priority, Fear Mass Deportation
content: Americans see immigration as the most pressing issue for President-elect Donald Trump to address, and a large majority believe he will order mass deportations of people living in the US illegally, a Reuters/Ipsos poll that closed Thursday found.
summary: Americans see immigration as the most pressing issue for President-elect Donald Trump to address, and a large majority believe he will order mass deportations of people living in the US illegally, a Reuters/Ipsos poll that closed Thursday found.

title: Thousands Flee Out-Of-Control California Wildfire As Homes Burn
content: Thousands of people were urged to flee an out-of-control wildfire burning around communities near Los Angeles on Thursday, with scores of homes already lost to the fast-moving flames.
summary: Thousands of people were urged to flee an out-of-control wildfire burning around communities near Los Angeles on Thursday, with scores of homes already lost to the fast-moving flames.

title: After Trump's Win, Americans Research "Move To" Canada, New Zealand, Australia
content: Many Americans are worried that Trump's presidency could drive a bigger wedge between Democrats and Republicans on issues such as race, gender, what and how children are taught, and reproductive rights.
summary: Many Americans are worried that Trump's presidency could drive a bigger wedge between Democrats and Republicans on issues such as race, gender, what and how children are taught, and reproductive rights.

title: LNG's Climate Impact: A Cleaner Alternative Or Hidden Emitter?
content: Liquefied natural gas (LNG) has positioned itself as a "transition" fuel to replace highly polluting coal. While LNG burns cleaner than coal, its climate impact is darkened by energy-intensive production and frequent leaks from gas fields.
summary: Liquefied natural gas (LNG) has positioned itself as a "transition" fuel to replace highly polluting coal. While LNG burns cleaner than coal, its climate impact is darkened by energy-intensive production and frequent leaks from gas fields.

title: YouTuber Famous For Drag Racing Videos Dies In High-Speed BMW Car Crash
content: A 25-year-old influencer and YouTuber, famous for his drag-racing videos, died in a car crash early Wednesday morning on the Nassau Expressway in Queens, New York.
summary: A 25-year-old influencer and YouTuber, famous for his drag-racing videos, died in a car crash early Wednesday morning on the Nassau Expressway in Queens, New York.

title: "Your Unifying Message Of Hope...": Rahul Gandhi Writes To Kamala Harris
content: Rahul Gandhi's message to Kamala Harris came after she lost to Donald Trump in the hotly-contested US presidential polls.
summary: Rahul Gandhi's message to Kamala Harris came after she lost to Donald Trump in the hotly-contested US presidential polls.

title: Here's Who Could Join Donald Trump's New Administration Team
content: Donald Trump is expected to draw top advisers and cabinet secretaries from a pool of Wall Street and business executives including officials from his first term - at least the ones who stuck by him.
summary: Donald Trump is expected to draw top advisers and cabinet secretaries from a pool of Wall Street and business executives including officials from his first term - at least the ones who stuck by him.

title: Trump's Re-Election Spurs Record $64 Billion Surge For World's Wealthiest
content: The re-election of Donald Trump spurred a surge in wealth for the worlds 10 richest billionaires, who collectively gained $64 billion in a single day.
summary: The re-election of Donald Trump spurred a surge in wealth for the worlds 10 richest billionaires, who collectively gained $64 billion in a single day.
